Title: The American People - Via the President of the United States of America: Recall all 535 members of the US Congress
Overview:
A GOVERNMENT by the people should mean more to our representatives than simply party affiliations personal political aspirations or partisan political interests. Our elected officials have a duty to represent the best interests of the American People and not the interests of the industry lobbyists their political party or their own political careers.

Clearly something is BROKEN IN OUR CONGRESS.

If it were within our power each and every one of the 435 voting members of the House of Representatives and the 100 voting members of the Senate would be recalled.

We understand that only fraction of the State constitutions within the UNITED STATES of AMERICA allows for the recall of elected officials.

This petition is not meant to represent an OFFICIAL action for RECALL as that would be impossible under current law.

It is however possible to send a STRONG MESSAGE to our elected officials that if our respective State and the Federal Constitutions allowed for the RECALL of CONGRESS we would not hesitate to set into motion the process that would send them packing without hesitation and without their pensions.

PLEASE  sign this petition and send a STRONG MESSAGE to our ELECTED Congressional Representatives and Senators to quit the party politics and get the UNITED STATES of AMERICA back on track – back to being the envy of the rest of the World.

 

We will remember October 1 2013 during the upcoming elections.
Letter Body: Recall all 535 members of the US Congress
